airport.title: From Airport
airport.subtitle: From Chandigarh International Airport
instructions: By Taxi/Car: Hire a taxi from the airport directly to IIT Ropar (approx. 60 km, 1.5 hours).

By Bus: Take a taxi/auto to ISBT Sector 43, Chandigarh. From there, take a bus to Rupnagar (Ropar) Bus Stand. From the bus stand, hire an auto-rickshaw or take a local bus to IIT Ropar main campus (approx. 6-7 km).
By Train: Take a taxi/auto to Chandigarh Railway Station, then board a train to Rupnagar Railway Station (if available). From there, follow the directions below.

railway.title: From Railway Station
railway.subtitle: From Rupnagar (Ropar) Railway Station (Closest Railway Station):
instructions: By Auto-Rickshaw: The main campus is about 6-7 km from the station. Auto-rickshaws are available outside and will take you directly to IIT Ropar main campus (approx. â‚¹150).
